metadata.title: CVE-2019-3833 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Openwsman, versions up to and including 2.6.9, are vulnerable to infiniteloop in process_connection() when parsing specially crafted HTTP requests.A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability bysending malicious HTTP request to cause denial of service to openwsmanserver.

criterions.comment: openwsman package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
